website_summaries.verdict: The soft rubber material of this doorstop allows it to be pushed farther into the door gap than most models, while the included holder keeps the doorstop on the back of the door when not in use.
pros: The soft rubber on this wedge will bend to go farther beneath the door than more rigid doorstops, holding the door more firmly
The included decorative holder attaches to the back of the door and also stores the doorstop is not in use
cons: Heavier doors may squash the soft material too far down to be held in place

customer_reviews.title: Well designed, well made. Perfect door stops.
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality and are flexible. Because we have cats that will remove a doorstop placed under the door, we use these as "wedges" -- placing them where cats can't reach them. The problem with most wedges is, if someone isn't aware one is in place they try to close the door and can actually break the door by pulling too hard -- these are "squishy" and have some give, preventing this issue entirely. The little holders are a great idea, the door stop is always on the back of the door, ready to be used when needed.
customer_reviews.author: John Howard

customer_reviews.title: Best door stops
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my existing doorstops from WallyWorld. These are amazing (or at least as amazing as doorstops can be). I'm using them throughout my house on doors with large gaps and small gaps and on tile and carpet floors. They hold excellently in all cases. They look better than my old brown ones. Storing them on the back of the door when not in use is a really great feature. My wife loves the fact that they aren't in the way while vacuuming and sweeping. If you're looking for excellent doorstops, you've found them!
customer_reviews.author: KBieb

customer_reviews.title: Not good for security
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to use for added security when we travel this summer to China. The description said they were great for security. They did not work on any of the doors at our house that we tried them on. I was able to push the doors open and the stopper just squished down. They might be fine if all you are wanting are for them to hold a door open, but they were not at all helpful for security purposes. We sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to hold a fairly standard door open with a floor of somewhat slick concrete (warehouse floor). None of them held at all. Every time I turned around the door was closed again. Might have given it 2 stars for the "free gift" on babyproofing, but that was just a downloadable flyer that you get anywhere. Completely worthless purchase. To be fair however, these would probably work well on something with more resistance like a rough wood, carpet, or even rough concrete floor. I'm giving it 1 star because of my experience; yours may be different.
customer_reviews.author: Kal Teague

customer_reviews.title: Nice for door stops and dogs that like to chew!
customer_reviews.text: These are great, just wish my dog would stop stealing them and chewing the rubber. He's not even a destructive dog but something about these just appeal to him too much! Regardless, still have to give 5 stars for their intended purpose... stopping doors.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great wedges!
customer_reviews.text: I know these are just wedges, but they're really great wedges. I've only used them on doors with carpeted floors, but they don't slide at all. Once you wedge one under the door, the door does not move, even in a fairly stiff breeze. And I really love the holder that attaches to the door! Keeps things looking neat when you don't need the wedge. I only have 4 doors that need a wedge, so I already have two more than I need. But if I ever need more wedges, these would be my top choice.
customer_reviews.author: JBC

customer_reviews.title: First Year - Fantastic!;  Second Year - Poor!
customer_reviews.text: These doorstops were great when I first started using them (I especially liked the included storage pocket), however after a few months of constant use, the rubber began to lose its resilience and the doorstops became useless. For awhile I stacked two of the doorstops together, but that only worked for a short time. I also tried filling the holes with silicone to see if that would add some stiffness - No, that failed too. My suggestion to anyone thinking of buying this product is find another (stiffer!) product if you are planning on heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ted

customer_reviews.title: Stoppers that do their job - STOP
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a door stopper that would look decent and perform it's task well. I found just what I was looking for on Amazon and decided to purchase it. I have to say I really like these door stoppers. They are perfect. I even had a door that was cut off due to the thickness of my carpet and 1 stopper would not hold the door so I stacked one on top of another and that got the job done. Well done to those involved in selling this product. It works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Lane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: We've tried several different door stops to hold the heavy, inner doors of our church, and nothing has worked until now. The material with which these are made grips the floor and slips under the doors very well, even when the floors are coated with the usual powdery film brought in from outside. The six-pack is priced very reasonably and provides us with a supply of back-ups if/when they become necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Maspethian

customer_reviews.title: Not as tall as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, they do work, I was very disappointed that they are under 1.25 inches tall. I was looking for a taller door stop, but these do not fit the bill. The door work in the door jam gaps on some doors. I bought these for the advertised size and was disappointed. 1.3" is not the height they measure at.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene T.

customer_reviews.title: Works for bigger gaps
customer_reviews.text: I have not had the chance to try these everywhere I want to but I did try this doorstop on the door going from the garage to outside. The space under the door was too large for the doorstop. Because of how these are made I simply had to add another doorstop and it worked great. So far happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Useful and durable
customer_reviews.text: I use these for work to stop trash containers from rolling. Works perfectly even with increased weight. The rubber design helps to prevent the stopper from sliding.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: They Make Great Laptop Stands
customer_reviews.text: While I'm sure these make great door stops, I bought them to use as laptop stands. I like my keyboard to be at a slight angle and the height of these works great. Plus they're soft so they won't scratch either the laptop or the desk. Moreover, they're portable, so I can just throw them into my laptop bag and use them anywhere. Finally, they're stable, so the laptop won't move around as I type. I'm considering getting a 3/4" dowel to run between them so that setup is simple as I move place to place.
customer_reviews.author: Loring

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! We have two cats and two dogs so having doorstoppers that I know the location of when not in use is pure genius! The stop itself is very well made of textured rubber material. It works well on both carpet and hardwood floors. The storage container is perfect size and does not take up much room on the door at all. The adhesive used to afix the item to the door is quite strong and I can see it lasting a long time. I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Michael S Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Best door stop I've found!
customer_reviews.text: I teach at a school and these door stops have no trouble holding open the heavy classroom doors - even on carpet! The holders are a bonus! No more searching around for the stops when not in use. Excellent value! I've tired every "heavy duty" stop at the big box hardware stores and they have all been mediocre to horrible. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lou Who

customer_reviews.title: Good Concept But Loses Tension
customer_reviews.text: The door closer was promising and worked well during the first week. Like noted in other reviews the tension tends to weaken over time and it must be tightened in order to get the same closing results. Unfortunately, I’m now on the very last setting and after a couple of days again to a point where it will not close the door.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pederson

customer_reviews.title: Beware if your door gaps are large
customer_reviews.text: I measured a few of my doors but should have measured all of them. In some instances, I need to use two stoppers to fit under the door. Otherwise, good product and so far, adhesion is good. I only installed them a couple of days ago.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Tastes too good to dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I cannot give this product five stars. And the reason is, it tastes too good to dogs. You need to make one that doesn't taste good to dogs. So they won't chew them up. While you may think this is tongue-in-cheek, It is not.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W Mumma

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take along
customer_reviews.text: I use these for special event venues when built-in door stops aren’t available. These are distinct (plus I wrote my name on the underside with a permanent marker), easy to retrieve, and easy to carry along. The angle, construction, and weight combined make for a very good doorstop.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabethy

customer_reviews.title: Great little door stops!
customer_reviews.text: These door stops are great all over my home. I have three cats so these keep the doors open so they won't get shut into a room. The holders are great as they store the door stops off the floor where my cats can not carry them off. The adhesive that holds the holder secures tightly the first contact so be careful you position the holder where you want it before you press it in place, as it will not come back off!
customer_reviews.author: Debi Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great little door stops!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for wood floors. The adhesive stop holder for the door is a very nice touch. I am very happy with them. I only issue with them is and it's not the fault of the product but my 6 month old golden retriever loves to grab them and chew them. Hoping he grows out of his chewing stage soon. lol. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Edward D. Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!! And a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with these stoppers!!! Great design, easy to stack two for big gaps, they look awesome, and the little clip is perfect to hang then on the door when not in use. We're using 20 of these around our large commercial building.
customer_reviews.author: S. Carlin

customer_reviews.title: Nice doorstops
customer_reviews.text: Doorstops are usually boring wedges, but these are actually attractive. The holders meant for a wall seem to stick -- I only attached one using the tape on the back, but it is adhesive for now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B Miller

customer_reviews.title: All I had to do was double up on the door stopper, & it fit in the 2 inch gap.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time & came in Ziploc baggie in pristine condition. Only issue I had, was that just one door stopper, wasn't enough. I had to put together two of them in order to hold my door open. Other than that, it worked just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the price and they back their products.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Items are very sturdy. Fits under door. Just push it until door is secure. They all come with covers. Very happy with purchase. Also received an email from seller to contact them with any problems. Big plus!! Would order again. Thank you for the quality purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DONNA M. BALSAMO

customer_reviews.title: Works as designed
customer_reviews.text: These door stoppers work as designed - they hold the door in place on both carpet and linoleum. Use a slight tug to seat the door and you are set. I haven't used the holders as most of the time I've tried with this type of adhesive they usually fall off when the weather gets hot.
customer_reviews.author: FrankS

customer_reviews.title: Great basic doorstops (don’t buy for lock down purposes)
customer_reviews.text: These are great little door stops. They work well on tile and carpet and are extremely well made. I actually bought them as a door block for a lock down. Unfortunately, they don’t work as well for that. It does make the door harder to open, but not enough to keep an intruder out.
customer_reviews.author: GA Peach

customer_reviews.title: Love them!  Our building's maintenance manager wants some!
customer_reviews.text: These are the classiest doorstops we've ever seen! Beautiful, functional, etc.... The holder is great. Never seen that before. Our building's maintenance manager wanted to know where to get them, so you'll be seeing a nice big order!
customer_reviews.author: mrcohn

customer_reviews.title: Smart Design makes These Door Stops Great
customer_reviews.text: The door stops work well and have a design light year ahead of those old brown wedges. I spent more money on these high-end door stops and after a week we love them! Not only do they work good but the adhesive holder is genius! We have 25 doors in our building, and we were tired of kicking them down the hallway. Now they are where they are supposed to be and easy to put away when not in uses. I tried out a 6-pack and now I am ordering enough for our whole building.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lalime

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: love that each one comes with a holder to hang when not in use, would prefer them to be a little thicker, some doors are not as low and go right over the doorstop
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid door stop that looks good
customer_reviews.text: If the bottom of your door has a particularly large gap, this doorstop might now work. But otherwise, it's excellent and doesn't damage the doors.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good value
customer_reviews.text: They work really well. Do not slide or damage the doors. They fit under the lowest of my doors. The stick on holders are such a good idea: no more crawling around looking for the door stop that was kicked under a chair or behind something. Plus, the gray colour is unobtrusive.
customer_reviews.author: Reads Anything

customer_reviews.title: Modern looking, works well, can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the price for 6 modern door stoppers that work well! I needed the highest part of the wedge for some doors in my house, but they work well from the thin to thick part of wedge. They slide smoothly under doors and have some cushion to them, so that doors don't slide back toward the thin part of the wedge. The white holder is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Vegas Mama

customer_reviews.title: Coolest door stop on the block
customer_reviews.text: Handed a couple of these out to family as I only needed two. Each of them said "This is a doorstop!? How fancy." I love the look and the holder it comes with is a major plus. SofiHome made having a doorstop a look cool. (ha!) Does the job as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bonskie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, just what I was looking for. Other door stoppers are not high enough and they are slippery, which defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Beth W.

customer_reviews.title: Really cool!
customer_reviews.text: We really like these. I removed the sticker already on the product, and adhered the holders with Command strips. Otherwise work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: K. Haddlesey

customer_reviews.title: Stylish yet very functional.
customer_reviews.text: Stylish yet very functional door stops. My doors are a bit higher off the ground, so I put one door stop on top of the other door stop and it really keeps that door open, without marks. It’s very convenient to have the holder to put on the wall also. It was such a great product, I bought another set!
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Could not be happier
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful door stops. Our lake house has doors with large gaps at the bottom and ref size door stops would not work. These are perfect, attractive and the stick on holder for them is another great feature . Now we can place them, in the holder on the back of the doors and always know where they are when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, effective door stops
customer_reviews.text: We received the door stops yesterday and are so happy with them. We have heavy commercial type doors and they do the trick. They don’t slide or squish like some other door stops do. I think you too would like them!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed and pleased by this product. They are working great both on Carpet, Hardwood and Vinyl floors. I even like the holes in the side as it enabled me to attach a small string to the door stop and tie it off to the door. (People keep taking my door stops and I thought this would be the perfect solution).
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: The stoppers come in real handy to the doors at the USO at DFW Airport. We never have to worry about them losing any traction no matter what the surface is whether tile or laminate flooring.
customer_reviews.author: M. Shapu

customer_reviews.title: Great for university classrooms!
customer_reviews.text: I teach in a university, and some of the classroom doors are self-closing. They are not fire doors. In this time when the spread of COVID-19 is a big concern, it makes sense to have the door open while students file in and out so they don't all have to touch the handle. I also like that these rubber stops are precisely engineered and much less likely to chip off the veneer of the door than wood wedges.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T Langewisch

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but would like more gripping for carpet
customer_reviews.text: I like that they are pliable. The grey color matches the carpet well.. It would be nice to have teeth that could grip carpet better. They slide unless I forcefully wedge them under the door to provide enough friction.
customer_reviews.author: Alise

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and fresh.
customer_reviews.text: These doorstops look quite different from your normal doorstop. The adhesive hook is a really handy addition. I bought them mostly because of the design. Haven't had any issues with them, mostly use them to prevent cross wind from slamming my doors shut.
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Love the storage holder
customer_reviews.text: They are very strong and work well on tiles, carpets, hardwood, and concrete floors. The storage holders are very helpful to keep the stoppers in place.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy JST

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, sturdy, long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bunch of these to use at work and we’ve had them for a few years now. They are still holding on tough
customer_reviews.author: Sal H

customer_reviews.title: weight they hold
customer_reviews.text: Using them in my office for 12 doors live the holder i know when one is missing and from what office kerp heavy doors open
customer_reviews.author: john g

customer_reviews.title: Works well and looks great
customer_reviews.text: The product looks amazing compared to other door stoppers. It also comes with a holder that goes great on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in the Moving Business and these doorstops are the best we've come across. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Va. Bch.

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to put in my kids' backpacks so they can help keep a door closed if needed. Since it was a pack of 6 we gave some to their friends, too. They work fine to hold a door open. They help keep a door closed more as a delay tactic.
customer_reviews.author: Adriane Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the sturdiest chocksI have ever purchased. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Phil C

customer_reviews.title: Best door stoppers
customer_reviews.text: "Very nice heavy large doorstops for doors higher off the floor." I recommend them to anyone for any door, high or low off the floor. Just wedge them under the door as far as needed and they work great!
customer_reviews.author: C. Bringman

customer_reviews.title: The only door stop you need!
customer_reviews.text: Clever design! Like the stackable feature. I have high gaps under my doors.
customer_reviews.author: Marti Ingram

customer_reviews.title: great door stops
customer_reviews.text: you stick them under the door and it will not close, a product that does what it is made for!
customer_reviews.author: GARY O'REILLY

customer_reviews.title: The Bee's Knees
customer_reviews.text: Stops doors even on carpets, kinda like periods stop sentences....Period.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Lee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold a heavy door open!
customer_reviews.text: They do not work as well as stated. The rubber is very hard and doesn't give at all. It does not hold a heavy door open and hardly stays under the edge at all. A disappointment!! The holder, however, is a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: j3a3r

customer_reviews.title: Seriously people, these are really great doorstops!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my heavy classroom door. They are very sturdy and not bulky. I love how simple they look, yet are so strong. AND, they can adjust to any gap at the bottom of the door! Love the price too!
customer_reviews.author: M. Strabala Parker

customer_reviews.title: Everyone keeps asking where we got them
customer_reviews.text: These are working great and everyone keeps asking where we got them. The little holders are awesome and we mounted them on the baseboards for easy storage and access.
customer_reviews.author: rhonda l

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid but flexible doorstop, good deal for six of them.
customer_reviews.text: Nice rubbery material, I use one to keep my front door closed firmly to stop cold air from coming in near the top of the door. The stopper fits snugly into the space between the door and the frame, exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: They work well!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of these door stops. I use them in approved areas of the hospital and they are great - able to hold very heavy doors without sliding out.
customer_reviews.author: kimberleigh

customer_reviews.title: Great invention!
customer_reviews.text: These are actually a gift to my son and his wife, so I haven't tried them extensively, but they seem like they might do the trick holding the door to stop a determined toddler!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen F.

customer_reviews.title: worked great on tile and concrete
customer_reviews.text: good sized rubber stoppers that really grip and are tall enough to get under any door. the included adhesive carrier means you'll always have it on hand.
customer_reviews.author: wheezal

customer_reviews.title: Great door stops
customer_reviews.text: Stops the door well even on carpet. The holder is a good idea, sticks well to the inside of the door so it's there when you want it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CaptainPJ

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't hesitate to recommend.
customer_reviews.text: These doorstops are a good price and work perfect for our home.
customer_reviews.author: H. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great door stopper
customer_reviews.text: Works great.I have alot of thing's hanging on back of door and this keeps door from shutting.fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Nice door stoppers
customer_reviews.text: These door stoppers look and work great. We just bought a new building with heavy glass doors. These stoppers did the trick and look much nicer than most other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: ... my doors from slamming shut when the weather is nice and all the windows are open
customer_reviews.text: They keep my doors from slamming shut when the weather is nice and all the windows are open. The holders that stick on the door are very convenient. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: paedae 249

customer_reviews.title: Door stops are always visable
customer_reviews.text: the adhesive holder keeps the door stop from being kicked away from the door.
customer_reviews.author: Frank P. Di Pompeo

customer_reviews.title: Great doorstop on all surfaces
customer_reviews.text: These doorstops are great. The old rubber stop I had would slide on my wood floors. These do not! So happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Long

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These work perfectly! Love that they are flexible, can be used in all the doors of our old/uneven house :). And the little storage cup is an excellent touch - no more searching high and low, muttering like a crazy person, WHERE DID I PUT THAT THING??!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lacoste

customer_reviews.title: This just don't work
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the dam don't work in a dam door that I have in the house
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Salkeld

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product, very good Quality"
customer_reviews.text: Excellent door stopper and love the attachment it comes with to hold the door stopper into the door when your not using it. Definitely can’t lose these now.
customer_reviews.author: Luis A Bencosme

customer_reviews.title: A Great Door Stop
customer_reviews.text: Better looking than most, great price, and super effective. We went with the bigger ones and we are glad we did. They do not look out of place or too big on any door.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Norris

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: How nice to find reliable and affordable silly houseware needs. Love how these door stops look and perform. Only wish more colors available to match woodwork!
customer_reviews.author: olga

customer_reviews.title: Good for propping doors not security
customer_reviews.text: Good for propping a door open, that’s about it. If that’s what you are looking for give it 5 stars I wanted some security to it and it slides so not for what I wanted it for. The holders are cool.
customer_reviews.author: W. Holt Gordon Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Genius Design!
customer_reviews.text: Best door stopper ever! The design is excellent & works beautifully. Plus the "holder" for the door stopper is very clever & useful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. I like the little holder
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I like the little holder. Staff likes it and uses it as well to store the door stopper when it's not in use. Slick idea.
customer_reviews.author: Spain7

customer_reviews.title: Quite Handy
customer_reviews.text: These doorstops are quite handy. They work great on our tile and wood floors. The included holders fit perfectly between the wall and the door trim.
customer_reviews.author: Designer

customer_reviews.title: Ok for propping Open door
customer_reviews.text: Good for keeping door propped open, but too weak to keeping one closed or for heavy doors since they tend to slide under pressure on carpet or tile.
customer_reviews.author: R. Shehane

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This product works with many sizes of doors. the pocket that attaches to the door or the wall is a plus. When I need to have doors in open in place at any wind they stay open and look great. Nice product and great material. It is my favor of many that I used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: JUAN VASQUEZ

customer_reviews.title: high enough for bigger gap doors and good on hardwoods
customer_reviews.text: These are higher than the usual doorstop. They keep the door open on carpet, but especially on hardwoods.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Klimowicz

customer_reviews.title: Good doorstop
customer_reviews.text: It's a door stop and it's good at stopping doors. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and material; works wonderfully. It's easy to stack them if the gap under the door is larger than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Jones

customer_reviews.title: wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: this is exactly what we wanted and are very high quality
customer_reviews.author: review7788

customer_reviews.title: It is a door stop
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of wedge shaped rubber which keeps a door from swinging freely. It performs that function.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: It is not really a stopper, it can hold ...
customer_reviews.text: It is not really a stopper, it can hold a door open. I tried it on vinyl and carpet floor
customer_reviews.author: walkthroughsky

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality, convenient, superb
customer_reviews.text: By far, best doorstoppers I have purchased for my facility in all my time here.
customer_reviews.author: Subud New York

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed !!
customer_reviews.text: These are so so perfect and useful! I love you can stick on the door and always know where to find.
customer_reviews.author: Katie McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: Wedges multi-use!
customer_reviews.text: We needed these not for a door, but something to keep our recliners from sliding around on the RV carpet when we are traveling. These filled the bill !
customer_reviews.author: Shopper56

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t hold door
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t hold door. I tried it on several different doors with different floor material. Hardwood, tile, carpets and it slipped every time.
customer_reviews.author: Katrinka

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Door Stops! Get you some!!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice value for some sturdy door stops that are easy to store and do a great job on a variety of commercial exterior and interior doors. Am absolutely going to order some more!
customer_reviews.author: J. Rector

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I love the color rather than the typical brown.
customer_reviews.author: Tera Sue Weite

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, wish therewas a larger giant size version.
customer_reviews.text: I love how the product doesn't scratch the floor or surface of doors. It really was nice to hear this is a family business. I use them to prop heavier doors and I would hope to see a bit more height and width to support that because the door drags a bit and then door stop is not tall enough. I think an extra large or giant version of the doorstop model would be wonderful. I like that the pack comes with six
customer_reviews.author: Justin C.

customer_reviews.title: I kept these because I opened the pack but they ...
customer_reviews.text: I kept these because I opened the pack but they still slide when the wind goes through and creates the door to shut.
customer_reviews.author: Paula A. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, but check to make sure that the door you use them on opens in the right direction!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: These are great door wedges and being able to double up for wider spaces is clutch. They are priced better than the name brand wedges and that's a plus when we use so many at my job.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Block doors from unwanted entries
customer_reviews.text: Using to block doors closed/open in classrooms and apartment- working like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These really work
customer_reviews.text: These are the best doorstops ever! We live in a very windy area of the Big Island of Hawai’i and ordinary doorstops just aren’t up to the task. We have these all over our house.
customer_reviews.author: Watercat

customer_reviews.title: Great Door Stop
customer_reviews.text: This combination of doorstop and self-sticking holder is great. It does exactly what we need it to do and was available at a great price. Delivery was timely and as expected. I've already had folks here at work ask me for the ones I didn't have a use for right away - they're really popular.
customer_reviews.author: VideoGuy

customer_reviews.title: Double stack em!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent trick to double stack these for high water doors over thresholds that went from carpet to tile/wood.
customer_reviews.author: Abc

product_meta.title: Door Stopper 6 Pack [1.3" high] - Bonus Holders - SofiHome Premium Heavy Duty Door Stop Rubber Wedge with Decorative Holder - Ideal for Large & Small Door Gaps - The Improved (6, Gray)
product_meta.description:
Looking for a door stop that actually works? Whether you need a baby safety door stopper or a door holder to to keep doors open, want to keep your home cozy with a door draft stopper or wish to ensure that a door remains open for easy access to a room in your office, SofiHome Rubber Doorstops Accessory Set is the perfect solution for you.


SofiHome rubber door wedges are indeed YOUR BEST CHOICE. Why?


MORE FOR YOUR MONEY: Get the best value for your money with our 2 Pack at our ✧LIMITED-TIME✧SALE PRICE✧

MORE CONVENIENT: You won't need to look for the doorstop! - it is just there inside the hook!

MORE EFFECTIVE: Non-slip texture for optimum friction with any flooring surface. Stops drafting doors perfectly even the heavy ones!

MORE LASTING: Made out of Durable, Intensively Tested and Optimized PREMIUM RUBBER.

ODORLESS: Unlike other rubber door wedge products, our door holder is odor free!

STYLISH: Unlike other clunky rubber/plastic door jammers, our door stops are uniquely crafted with a sleek low-profile design to perfectly complement any décor style.


These rubber door stoppers really are the last ones you will ever need to purchase!
We are just certain that you will LOVE using our door stopper, which is why we are offering you an iron-clad
100% MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE!

Start guarding those slamming doors now - Click Add to Cart and get your DISCOUNT TODAY! *This stopper does not work as a security tool to keep a door closed against a force opening it. It will not protect against intruders trying to break into your home! Its job is to hold a door open!
feature_bullets: 🚪 NEVER LOSE IT - You won't need to look for the door stop - it is standing there inside its hook! The storage holder piece provides a convenient reach to the door wedge whenever required.
🚪 MAXIMIZE VALUE - 6 pack of (L 4.8" x W 1.6" x H 1.3") SofiHome decorative door stoppers including storage holders at the Best Price!
🚪 WORRY NOT & GRAB YOUR BONUS - Enjoy SofiGOODs' 100% no-questions-asked refund policy.

🚪 SECURE STABILITY & AVOID SLIDING - SofiHome Door Stoppers are designed to securely wedge even the heaviest doors on any flooring surfaces. The heavy rubber material provides an optimum friction effect to fix the door dead in its tracks!
🚪 GET IT & FORGET IT - SofiHome door stops are made of a Durable, Odorless and Intensively Tested Premium Rubber that will last and function for many years to come.
